name: Major Miners
description:
Note: The WebGL build has some... irregularities with the music. The windows build shouldn't have any issues!

A two-person local multiplayer tower defense game. 

One player is the attacker, while the other is the defender. The defender must place towers in order to stop the attacker's units from reaching the center of the map, which houses a crashed asteroid containing a very valuable resource. 

The attacker has 3 units:

- The Miner: Will dig a path through to the center

- The Looter: Will move along open paths to the center

- The Dismantler, Will move to within 1 tile of any available towers in order to dismantle it.

The Defender also has 3 units:

- Instant: The bread and butter basic tower; Shoot once, hit one enemy for one instance of damage.

- AoE: Deals some AoE damage around the area the target which the projectile collides with.

- DoT: Shoots one projectile, deals some DoT. Has slightly higher DPS than the Instant tower.

Controls:

Attacker

Move Cursor - WASD

Place Unit - E

Zoom Out Camera - Tab

Toggle Tooltips - Left Shift

Designate Tile to be Mined be your Miners - Space

Defender

Move Cursor - Arrow Keys

Place Unit - Keypad Return

Zoom Out Camera - Keypad Plus

Toggle Tooltips - Keypad Minus

Sell Tower - Keypad 0

General

Pause Game - Escape

This game started as part of the Town One in-person Game Jam. I took a couple of days to fix & polish it afterward. More can be done but here is where I will be leaving the project for a bit!

Wouldn't have been possible without the teammates!
